item.title: Netflix is experiencing a surprising pullback while S&P 500 hits records. How to trade it
item.description: Nishant Pant gives a bull call spread in Netflix.

item.title: The best ways to play the emergence of quantum computing, according to Rosenblatt
item.description: A handful of quantum stocks have seen a sharp run-up their valuations this year as investors bet on the fast-growing technology.

item.title: Whirlpool downgraded at Bank of America after poor results, dividend cut
item.description: Bank of America is moving to the sidelines on Whirlpool after the company's latest results suggest weaker near-term growth.

item.title: Tesla's valuation could 'far exceed' current levels, RBC Capital Markets says
item.description: The investment firm's new price target suggests shares are fairly valued, as the stock last closed at $325.59 per share.

item.title: Tuesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 closed just above the flatline as a trade deal between the U.S. and European Union failed to incite a rally. Here's what's on CNBC's radar...
